name: 蘇恆毅
objective:
This course aims to introduce the fundamental concepts and technologies of smart grids, covering the structure, functions, and applications of smart grids in modern power systems. Students will learn about smart meters, renewable energy integration, smart grid standards, and monitoring systems, among other core topics. Through case studies, students will deepen their understanding of smart grids.
本課程旨在介紹智慧電網的基礎概念與技術，涵蓋智慧電網的結構、功能及其在現代電力系統中的應用。學生將學習智慧電錶、再生能源整合、智慧電網標準及監控系統等核心議題，並透過案例研究加深對智慧電網的理解。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction and Class Guidelines (課程簡介及上課規則)
Week 2-4: Overview of Smart Grids (智慧電網概述)
Week 5-6: Renewable Energy Integration (再生能源整合)
Week 7-8: Smart Grid Standards (智慧電網標準)
Week 9: Midterm Exam (期中考)
Week 10-11: Smart Grid Monitoring, Communication, and Protection Systems (智慧電網監控、通訊、及保護系統)
Week 12-13: Smart Grid Components (智慧電網元件)
Week 14-15: Power System Analysis in Smart Grids (智慧電網電力系統分析)
Week 16-17: Case Studies (案例研究)
Week 18: Final Exam (期末考)
